fullText:
Protective Hex

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, warlock, Warlock’s Curse class feature
Benefit: When you hit an enemy you have cursed with an attack, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to close and melee attacks against your allies until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 31.
name: Protective Hex
